uri.description: The URI of the configuration entity

local_utc_offset_in_seconds.description: Local UTC offset in seconds (time zone). Value shall be between -43200 (-12:00) and 50400 (+14:00). Switch accepts value in minutes. If the given value is not divisible by 60, then it will be rounded off to the nearest minute value.

auto_adjust_dst.description: Whether to automatically adjust clock for DST changes.

custom_dst_begins_rule.description: Custom rule for when DST begins.

custom_dst_end_rule.description: Custom rule for when DST ends.

time_server_protocol.description: The time server protocol to use. No value if manual date/time was set.
